definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: exultant, jubilant (on form cf. Lag:BN 110);—fs. [[עַלִּיזׇה]] jubilant city Is 22:2 (‖[[עִיר הׂמִיׇּה]]), Is 32:13, cf. Zep 2:15 and (city om.) Is 23:7; of pers., pl. [[שְׁאוֹן עַלִּיזִים]] Is 24:8; cstr. [[עַלִּיזֵי]] [[גַּאֲוׇתִי]] Is 13:3, cf. Zep 3:11, v. [[גַּאֲוׇה]].
